name: Little Red Riding Hood A
description:
The classic children's story, as an interactive point and click game with gorgeous artwork.  It is a simple game, but has two different endings.

This game is part of  series of short demo games made with the Elm Narrative Engine. 

This particular game demonstrates how the same interactive story script can be embedded into wildly different styles of games.  I have this 2D point-and-click version, a fully text-based version, and a top-down version.

You can try to top-down version here:
